hotel

Class Hotel

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotel.Hotel

  • public class Hotel
extends java.lang.Object
    Application to manage an hotel The functionalities are: add customers, display empty rooms, view all rooms, delete customers, find rooms by the name of the customer Stores and Loads information from a file Orders guests ascending alphabetically by their names

        personDetails - Array of type Person
        rooms - Array of type Rooms
        position - index to be removed
        Returns:
        true if an error was not found, false if the index is out of boundaries

      • addToArray

        public static boolean addToArray(Room[] rooms,
                                 java.lang.String customerName,
                                 int nGuests,
                                 int roomRequested)
        boolean method to add a new element to a Person array
        Parameters:
        rooms - Array of type Room
        customerName - String containing the first value to be inserted into the array
        nGuests - Integer containing the second value to be inserted into the array
        roomRequested - Integer containing the array index to store the data
        Returns:
        returns true

                                 java.lang.String customerFirstName,

                                 int roomRequested)

        Parameters:
        person - Array of type Person
        customerFirstName - String containing the first value to be inserted into the array
        customerSurname - String containing the second value to be inserted into the array
        customerCreditCardNumber - String containing the third value to be inserted into the array
        roomRequested - Integer containing the array index to store the data
        Returns:
        returns true

        rooms. - Array of type Room to be stored into a file
        personDetails, - Array of type Person to be stored into a file
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if an error occurred

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isItFull

        public static boolean isItFull(Queue[] queue)
        Method to check if a queue is full
        Parameters:
        queue - array of type Queue
        Returns:
        boolean if end + 1 modulus the length of the queue is equal to the front. +1 because the front is initialised to -1.

      • isItEmpty

        public static boolean isItEmpty(Queue[] queue)
        Method to check if a queue is empty
        Parameters:
        queue - array of type Queue
        Returns:
        boolean if front and end is equal to the initialise value, which is -1

      • addToQueue

        public static boolean addToQueue(Queue[] queue,
                                 java.lang.String firstName,
                                 java.lang.String surname,
                                 java.lang.String CreditCardNumber,
                                 int numberOfGuests)
        Method to add an element into a Queue (LIFO) Calls IsItEmpty() to check if the queue is empty, if so, set front and end to 0 and is ready to store values. Calls IsItFull() to check if the queue is full.
        Parameters:
        queue - array of type Queue
        firstName - String containing (First Name of the Customer) to be entered into the queue
        surname - String containing (Surname of the Customer) to be entered into the queue
        CreditCardNumber - String containing (Customer Credit Card Number) to be entered into the queue
        numberOfGuests - integer containing (Number of Guests) to be entered into the queue
        Returns:
        boolean

      • resetQueueInPosition

        public static void resetQueueInPosition(Queue[] queue)
        Method to clear the position front, by setting Strings to "E" and Integer to 0
        Parameters:
        queue - Array of type Queue

      • removeFromQueue

        public static boolean removeFromQueue(Queue[] queue,
                                      Person[] person,
                                      Room[] room,
                                      int roomAvailable)
        Method to remove an element from a Queue (LIFO) Calls method to addToArray() the item removed into a different array Calls isItEmpty() to check is the queue is empty Calls resetQueueInPosition() to clear the front position calling the addToArray()
        Parameters:
        queue - array of type Queue
        person - array of type Person
        room - array of type Room
        roomAvailable - integer corresponding to the room for the element removed to be stored
        Returns:
        boolean

      • viewQueue

        public static void viewQueue(Queue[] queue)
        Display an array of type Queue
        Parameters:
        queue - array of type Queue
